example.name: transitive
example.text: As it stands now , Congress presumes after the Reagan administration that the White House will take unconstitutional provisions in appropriations bills [*-1] lying down .
example.arg: the White House will take unconstitutional provisions in appropriations bills [*-1] lying down

example.name: raising
example.text: Company officials said [0] [22 workers]-1 were missing and presumed [*-1] dead .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'presume' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Revised by Olga.
